text: Dale Barnstable (March 4, 1925 â€“ January 26, 2019) was an American basketball player. He was born in Antioch, Illinois. He was banned for life from the National Basketball Association (NBA) in 1951 for point shaving. He had a college career at the University of Kentucky before his career came to an abrupt end. He was drafted by the Boston Celtics in their 7th round pick. Barnstable died on January 26, 2019 in Louisville, Kentucky at the age of 93.Two-Time Basketball National Champion Barnstable Dies Saturday ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Shooting guards Category:Small forwards Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Louisville, Kentucky
title: Dale Barnstable
